scripts.build:ios: cd apps/native && eas build -p ios --profile production --local
scripts.build:ios:simulator: cd apps/native && eas build -p ios --profile production-simulator --local
scripts.build:android: cd apps/native && ANDROID_HOME=/opt/homebrew/share/android-commandlinetools JAVA_HOME=$(/usr/libexec/java_home -v17) eas build -p android --profile production --local
scripts.build:android:apk: cd apps/native && ANDROID_HOME=/opt/homebrew/share/android-commandlinetools JAVA_HOME=$(/usr/libexec/java_home -v17) eas build -p android --profile production-apk --local
scripts.dev:ios: cd apps/native && EAS_LOCAL_BUILD_WORKINGDIR=~/eas-builds-ios EAS_BUILD_PROFILE=development eas build -p ios --profile development --local --output ./build-dev.tar.gz
scripts.dev:android: cd apps/native && ANDROID_HOME=/opt/homebrew/share/android-commandlinetools JAVA_HOME=$(/usr/libexec/java_home -v17) eas build -p android --profile development --local
